DLG ITM_0

DLG SPR_0
I'm a cat

DLG ITM_0
You got a cup of tea! Nice.

DLG SPR_1
The traveler strove to reach his goal,

DLG SPR_2
Of royal and imperial pose,

DLG SPR_3
Fighting hard all through and through, at last, the brink of Xanadu!

DLG SPR_4
So, hard he struggled and did work too,

DLG SPR_5
To reach this goal, his Xanadu.

DLG SPR_6
But as he did try and did sit down, upon new throne with regal crown, something yonder glistened true, and turned to ruin this Xanadu!

DLG SPR_7
And aft long miles and longer days, the traveler indeed found his way,

DLG SPR_8
But as he did try and did sit down, upon new throne with regal crown, something yonder glistened true, and turned to ruin this Xanadu!

DLG SPR_9
Now tired of that of which he'd dreamed, as it was not quite what it seemed, the traveler longed for something new, for yet another Xanadu.

DLG SPR_a
But as he did try and did sit down, upon new throne with regal crown, something yonder glistened true, and turned to ruin this Xanadu!

END 0
The End
